error_auth_login: You couldn't be logged in due to an error!
error_auth_logout: You couldn't be logged out due to an error!
error_auth_password_change: Your password couldn't be changed due to an error!
error_auth_password_reset: Your password could't be reset due to an error!
headline_sub_auth_password_change: Allows you to change your currently active password
headline_sub_auth_password_forgot: Enter the e-mail address associated with your account to request a password reset!
headline_sub_auth_password_reset: Allows you to choose and set a new password for your account
text_auth_logout_error: You can try again shortly - or manually delete your user-data from the browser directly.
text_auth_logout_pending: Please standby while possible cleanup processes are running.
text_auth_logout_success: You will be automatically redirected to login-page shortly.
